subject: Critical Status Discrepancy - HAOS Task Queue
content:
URGENT: Major discrepancy found between JOBS.md and PROACTIVE-JOBS.md.

JOBS.md shows:
- 31 pending tasks across phases 8-12
- Worker spawn failures
- 4 high priority tasks listed

PROACTIVE-JOBS.md shows:
- Only 1 completed task (p11-6)
- 0 active tasks
- No pending queue

This suggests either:
1. Tasks completed but not recorded in JOBS.md
2. Task queue was not properly populated
3. Systemic failure in task management

Need guidance on whether to:
- Re-populate queue with the 31 pending tasks
- Audit current project status
- Investigate worker spawn failures

Awaiting instructions.
